directions: Combine nectarine, sugar, and citric acid powder in a microwave-safe cup or bowl; heat in microwave until mixture is bubbly and fruit is soft, about 90 seconds.
Blend nectarine mixture in a blender until desired consistency is reached.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon citric acid powder (such as Ball® Fruit-Fresh®)
title: Five-Minute Nectarine Jam
